narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Essential Home Care Inc. is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Jamaica, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $113.1M in Medicaid payments across 707K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $113.1M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,132 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
